ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller

Class EntryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller.EntryController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
public class EntryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller that handles HTTP requests for Entry objects in the TOMi system.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Iliya Kiritchkov, Karol Talbot

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EntryResourceAssembler assembler
      Converts Entry model objects into HATEOAS Resources objects.
      private EntryService entryService
      Provides services for maintaining Entry and Timesheet objects.
      private org.slf4j.Logger logger
      Provides access to the system logs for reporting errors.

      • EntryController

        @Autowired
public EntryController(EntryResourceAssembler assembler,
                                   EntryService entryService)
        Creates the EntryController.
        Parameters:
        assembler - Converts Entry model objects into Resources
        entryService - Provides services for maintaining Entry and Timesheet objects

    • Method Detail

      • getEntry

        @GetMapping(value="/entries/{id}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<Entry> getEntry(@PathVariable
                                                                                                java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                TimesheetAuthManager authMan)
        Gets the requested Entry in response to the GET request to /entries/id.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier for the requested entry
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        Resource for the requested Entry

      • createEntry

        @PostMapping(value="/entries")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createEntry(@RequestBody
                                                                                              Entry newEntry,
                                                                                              @RequestAttribute
                                                                                              TimesheetAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                       throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates a new Entry with the attributes provided in the POST request to /entries.
        Parameters:
        newEntry - an Entry object with required information.
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        response containing links to the newly created Entry.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the created URI is unable to be parsed.

      • updateEntry

        @PutMapping(value="/entries/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateEntry(@PathVariable
                                                                                                  java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                  @RequestBody
                                                                                                  Entry newEntry,
                                                                                                  @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                  TimesheetAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                           throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Updates the requested Entry with the Entry provided as the body of the PUT request to /entries/id.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier for the requested Entry
        newEntry - The Entry contained in the body of the HTTP request
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        Resource representing the updated Entry
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - When the URI constructed by the assembler fails to conform to URI standards

      • deleteEntry

        @DeleteMapping(value="/entries/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteEntry(@PathVariable
                                                                                                     java.lang.Long id)
        Deletes the requested Entry.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier for the Entry to be deleted
        Returns:
        Empty response to confirm the deletion of the requested entry

      • getAllTimesheetEntries

        @GetMapping(value="/timesheets/{id}/entries")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resources<org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<Entry>> getAllTimesheetEntries(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                TimesheetAuthManager authMan)
        Gets all the Entries associated with a requested timesheet.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier for the timesheet
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        List of Resources representing the entries for the requested Timesheet

      • copyEntry

        @PostMapping(value="/entries/{id}/copy")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> copyEntry(@PathVariable
                                                                                                      java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                      @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                      TimesheetAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                               throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates a partial copy of the requested entry.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier for the entry to be copied
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        The partial copy created from the requested entry
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - When the URI constructed by the assembler fails to conform to URI standards

      • handleExceptions

        @ExceptionHandler(value={EntryNotFoundException.class,IllegalEntryStateException.class})
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handleExceptions(java.lang.Exception e)
        Informs the client that an exception has occurred. In order to keep the server inner workings private a generic 400 bad request is used.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that had occurred
        Returns:
        A 400 Bad Request Response
